TooltipText: Use Charcoal to generate purified water.
Use Charcoal to generate purified water.
Provide offerings of meat or incense to generate Soul Essence.
Provide offerings of meat or incense to generate Life Essence.
Place a torch in the Torch Post to provide light to an area.
Burn animal fat to provide light to an area.
Place food in the outhouse to generate compost.
Catches small game after a time.
